title: Explaining why Fizz R feels BS in 4 drawings

replies.body: I like how from the first picture you can see you're clearly about to get dicked by Fizz.

> [{quoted}](name=HeeroTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-27T02:23:35.010+0000)
>
> I like how from the first picture you can see you're clearly about to get dicked by Fizz.

Hope the riot boards police would not take off the boards of this glorious picture of a di....erm fizz ult.

dimonstration? 

Spelled wrong but close enough

> [{quoted}](name=HeeroTX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-27T02:23:35.010+0000)
>
> I like how from the first picture you can see you're clearly about to get dicked by Fizz.

Came here to make this comment.

Looks like first, a squirting penis, followed by conception.

It means, Fizz is a dick champ and we are all getting fucked by him.
honestly I think he is annoying but he is not OP atm, but if they fix this visual misconception it will make playing against fizz feel a lot less bs
Does your pseudo is related to a french joke ( DÃ©conneur, same spelling as Deckowner,  in french means someone who likes to joke around)?
I knew this word in french but my id is actually a reference to yugioh.

> [{quoted}](name=The Deckowner,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-12-27T02:27:53.950+0000)
>
> honestly I think he is annoying but he is not OP atm, but if they fix this visual misconception it will make playing against fizz feel a lot less bs

I would disagree I think he is pretty sleeper op (not to an extreme but still too strong)

his ult is the size of a lane and pretty much undodgeable becasue of the reason you illustrated... and it has low cd and shark landing is essentially a 100% kill even if you rush an "anti-burst" item like abyssal(pretty much you rush Zhonyas vs fizz or you get pimp slapped in lane and if your ad well you're really screwed) 

 and he can freely dive becasue of troll pole and his roaming is insane becasue his diving ability and the fact if you follow he is gonna turn and more than likely kill you

His mid and late game is as shit as Talon, the delay damages means ADCs don't give a fuck about you once they get some lifesteal. Not to mention they kill you faster than you can kill them.

And also don't forget how broken locket redemption is.

> [{quoted}](name=The Deckowner,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=0002000000020000,timestamp=2016-12-27T23:37:32.864+0000)
>
> His mid and late game is as shit as Talon, the delay damages means ADCs don't give a fuck about you once they get some lifesteal. Not to mention they kill you faster than you can kill them.
> 
> And also don't forget how broken locket redemption is.

Falling off mid and late doesn't matter when you're able to constantly get fed early do to your kit having no counter play and the other laner having to totally surrender lane and ping roams(becasue they cant follow) from level 6 until the end of laning becasue an exceptionally strong kit  (and Fish being busted)

also "And also don't forget how broken locket redemption is." is irrelevant we're talking about Fizz... not Redemption... 

I mean saying Redemption is op so Fizz can be too makes no sense

also imo the problem solely stems from the fish right now...balance the fish and Fizz would be balanced too

What do you mean there is no counterplay? lets assume his ult is undodgeable, you can still dodge his q or e(if he use one during the ult cc he must use the other while you are mot.cc'ed), and his w only does damage after 2 seconds, that is literally free time for you to get away or fight back.

Love how you think fizz is op while he is actually in Talon state, shit like kat and leblanc are much more op and lack counterplay.

I agree, landing ult isn't very hard at all, but I think Riot did that because they made him reliant on landing it in order to actually assassinate. They gotta shift some power from that combo so Fizz has more options outside of the one combo, it'll also prevent Fizz from going down the gutter when they fix the hitbox.

The pickup zone is fine, the fact that it becomes an instantaneous hitbox is not.

Delay plz. Counterplay. Clarity. Rito plz

Q- dodgable, happens way more often than you might think
W- 2s delay before any meaningful damage, pretty clear visuals
E- dodgable, either around 1.5 delay or you double cast it for less untargetable time and to make it extremely unreliable
R- dodgable as well, blockable, 2s delay before the shark does damage.

Counterplay plz Kappa
counterplay against it latching on to you when you clearly dodged it. i think he means like a 1 sec delay instead of instantly latching on to the closest player.

The "pickup zone"? You mean the way his shark briefly knocks up everyone in its vicinity after 3+ seconds? 

Yeah, you might say it's "fine" because only a blind player with a burning PC would get hit by that. And among those, only a minority would care about its pathetic damage and CC.

No, by pickup zone he means the area in which the fish will latch on to you even if it wiffs terribly. And also.... pathetic damage and cc? What alternate universe are you living in, and how can I make it to that place where fizz ult is actually useless?

I ... see? In other words, he wants the shark to latch onto you more slowly?

Fizz ult by itself, if all it does is knock you up and didn't latch onto you is pretty useless yes. It's like one spell from a poke mage.
_-sigh-_
I don't know what of drug that makes you think 500 base power + 120% AP scaling is useless damage, but I sure as hell would like me some of that.

That's a lv 16 ult, at which point Fizz already won or lost the game. Even then, yes, with a little MR and/or with the myriad of shields and sustain in the game, that damage is pathetic.

The drug I take is called "actually taking into account what happens in-game". Regrettably, most people on Boards have long developed an immunity towards it. 

You take something called "what this 10-0 champion did in that one game happens all the time and is unacceptable".
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Hope this gets even more upvotes. Fizz's R is total bs. Even Scarra has gone on about how the fish simply flies off wherever and KABOOM, I GOTCHA for no apparent reason. It's irritating.

Scarra whined about Vayne too, he complains about everything that the community does. He's a demagogue. 

The hitbox might be huge but it's not for "no reason", it's quite intuitive.

So are you saying that Vayne was a balanced champion when Scarra made that remark? He is completely right. If Vayne is meta, it is literally only because she is insanely broken. 

At least Scarra whines about the things that matter and that are genuine problems.
Yeah, Vayne being viable doesn't make her broken. The fact that she can stop people who let her get in range and farm for free does not make her broken.
Crit vayne anyone?

Are you competing for how many downvotes you can gather by saying stupid shit in multiple threads?

You're winning if so.
Agreeing with a non-sense circlejerk for the sake of upvotes bores me.

explaining why it doesn't even matter if his ult hits stuff easily in one image

http://i.imgur.com/3RZcJzk.png
W i n r a t e = B a l a n c e
Winrate = balance unless play rate is really low/high or the champ has a high skill cap. None of those actually matter with Fizz.
there's a lot of fizz haters, but you'r right. if fizz's ult didn't attach easly, his winrate could be worst than nidalee
All they need to do is put a proper indicator to make sure everyone knows how much they need to dodge.
i agree tho

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lcsa9mzrYas
Why riot???
Would have been nice if the person who made this was being more serious. Now i have to question editing and why he had to change nidalee's form when it was fizz's turn to toss his projectile

> [{quoted}](name=invisiblecat1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-12-27T13:53:38.934+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lcsa9mzrYas
> Why riot???

That last part was amazing.
lol, dude you have no clue how the current fizz works :p

Oh...so i'm meant to read the drawings from the bottom to the top. lol
I love how you wrote the ult while travelling is very thin, and it suddenly becomes a mile wide

that is how the visual effect looks, and it is working as intended, fizz ult remains relatively slim until it reaches max range, and once that happens it sits there as the max size and any enemy champion who get into range will get attached by it.

btw i fixed the order sry.

The last panel reads "Fizz Your"...
Fizz my what?

> [{quoted}](name=Danjeng,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tjHX77nP,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-12-27T04:46:06.213+0000)
>
> The last panel reads "Fizz Your"...
> Fizz my what?

possbily something mildly depressing like your mom or something.

FIZZ R
YOU
I R not Fizz. Why must you insist this? Fizz and I are different entities.

Be le caitlyn

Fizz le ult in my direction.

I E away, already out of max range.

Fizz ult derps and latches onto me.

Le me dies.

wOW MUCH COUNTERPLAY RITO
